body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.30 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for OpenAL.
Many improvements in HTML and JavaScript support.
Many common controls fixes and improvements.
More Direct3D 10 work.
Better MAPI support.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
